overview: Just when you thought youâ€™d seen it all, along comes Rent-A-Friend. Released in 1987, this video was intended for lonely people with VCRs. Pop in the tape and, voila, your new friend, Sam, is in your living room.
tagline: He talks to you. He listens to you. He drinks with you. He even lends you money.
title: Rent-A-Friend
